name: Operate Now: Animal Hospital
description:
Welcome to the most realistic hospital simulation game dedicated to animals.

GAME FEATURES


- Take care of cats, dogs, tigers, and many other pets and animals.
- Unlock every type of facility (MRI rooms, pet salons, ambulance garages, and more).
- Complete more than 200 missions.
- Enjoy 6 full stories, and follow the adventures of Edan, Ash, Tiny, and their lovely pets.
- Hire and manage medical staff that include: vets, nurses, assistants, technicians, and groomers.
- Expand your pet hospital by adding new floors!
- Stay tuned! Regular events happen throughout the game!

SAVE ADORABLE PETS AND EXOTIC ANIMALS!

Doctor, we need you! Operate Now: Animal Hospital is the first animal hospital simulation game. You'll get the chance to manage vets helping pets (cats and dogs) and wild animals like tigers.

BUILD THE ULTIMATE ANIMAL HOSPITAL!

If you like building games, this is the right game for you. Create your own hospital, expand the number of floors, and choose the designs for each room. Operate Now: Animal Hospital is meant to be the world's most realistic hospital simulation game. You'll have to build medical departments just like in a real hospital that include: examination rooms, ambulance garages, MRI rooms, and more.

Hire and train your staff just like in a management game and help turn your hospital into one of the best in the world.

DIVE INTO BREATHTAKING STORYLINES!

Experience dramatic storylines centered around the fascinating characters working in your hospital.

Edan Stone is just one of them.

Edan arrived at the hospital shortly after reading about it on social media. She’s an idealistic student who specializes in zoological medicine. Edan's very talented, and she knows it. She's also hot tempered, and her self-righteous confidence is frequently annoying.

Meet Tim “Tiny” Thornton.

“Tiny” to his friends, he's one of the older members of the team. He's a well-built ex-con on parole with a heart of gold and a soft spot for all furry creatures great and small. He’s been with Ash since the beginning as a volunteer and was promoted to nurse by him, solely because of his experience and the care he put into his work. This doesn’t sit right with Edan. Tiny looks after the animals that stay overnight, and he serves as a security guard when things get heavy with the developer. He also has more than his fair share of street smarts.
And even more characters are waiting for you!
